changeSet.id: #4079 - generated relationship should refer to a CustomRelationshipTemplate
changeSet.author: Clément Bareth
changeSet.sql:
UPDATE crm_custom_field_tmpl AS cft SET crt_id = crt.id FROM cust_crt AS crt INNER JOIN cust_cet AS cet_source ON cet_source.id = crt.start_node_id INNER JOIN cust_cet AS cet_target ON cet_target.id = crt.end_node_id
WHERE cft.relationship_name = crt.name AND cft.entity_clazz <> '' AND ( cft.entity_clazz = 'org.meveo.model.customEntities.CustomEntityTemplate - ' || cet_source.code OR cft.entity_clazz = 'org.meveo.model.customEntities.CustomEntityTemplate - ' || cet_target.code )
